title.narrative: Cities and Infrastructure for Growth (CIG). Build the enabling environment for Investment into cities, energy, Infrastructure and Urban services for the poor. RDEL ICF element.

description.narrative: This activity (Cities and Infrastructure for Growth (CIG). Build the enabling environment for Investment into cities, energy, Infrastructure and Urban services for the poor. RDEL ICF element.) is a component of Cities and Infrastructure for Growth (CIG) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £7,224,051. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Energy policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: AECOM, Cardno Emerging Markets, Cowatersogema International Inc, IPE Global Private Limited. The start date is 26-03-2019 and the end date is 31-12-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
